about.me: I am a frontend web developer specializing in creating user-friendly and efficient interfaces using React and modern web technologies. I pay close attention to code quality, structured solutions, and user experience.
about.study: During my learning journey, I developed several web projects, achieving optimal solutions for various tasks. These experiences helped me grow not only technically but also creatively, enhancing my problem-solving skills.
about.new: I also have a background in music and art, which inspires creative solutions. My interest in business and economics allows me to better understand project strategy.
about.future: In the future, I aim to create complex interactive web projects, contribute to team success, and fully meet user needs. Every project is not just work for meâ€”it is a creative process.
